name: SunnyGolf
description:
A basic 2D Minigolf game with 18 holes and a relaxing atmosphere. (Made for a course at uni)

Controls: 

  • Klick and drag from the ball to select the stroke direction and power
  • Right-click to cancel a stroke
  • Klick and drag anywhere else to move the camera
  • Scroll to zoom
  • Hold Tab to show the scores

Music: Steellife by StoneOcean
